text: "Eleanor Rigby" is a 1966 song by The Beatles and taken from their album Revolver. It was released as a double A-side to Yellow Submarine. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Belgium and Canada, number 6 in Finland and number 11 in the United States. ==References== Category:The Beatles songs Category:1966 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Ray Charles songs Category:Paul McCartney songs Category:Tony Bennett songs Category:Joan Baez songs Category:Baroque pop songs Category:Art rock songs
title: Eleanor Rigby
